notes: it is noted that 'bayad' can be modified by adverbial to distinguish between strong and weak necessity
it is noted that the adverb hatman is optional but dropping it weakens the teleological reading
the author noted it is too strong for weak necessity
khāstan is the uninflected form of 'xah', 'xah' is the expression elicited
na is a negation morpheme on verb
this is putting the negation on the verb in the clause
this is putting the negation on the copula 'ist'
the author noted that this expression have more of an ability flavor
